bot_zh: 你好！我叫美玲。你叫什么名字？
bot_pinyin: nǐ hǎo! wǒ jiào měi líng. nǐ jiào shén me míng zi?
bot_eng: Hello! My name is Měilíng. What's your name?

bot_zh: 很高兴认识你！你今天怎么样？
bot_pinyin: hěn gāo xìng rèn shi nǐ! nǐ jīn tiān zěn me yàng?
bot_eng: Nice to meet you! How are you today?

bot_pinyin: nǐ xǐ huān xué zhōng wén ma?
expected_pinyin: xǐ huān wǒ hěn xǐ huān

bot_zh: 太好了！你学了多长时间？
bot_pinyin: tài hǎo le! nǐ xué le duō cháng shí jiān?
bot_eng: That's great! How long have you been studying?
expected_eng: I've been studying for one year

bot_zh: 一年了！很厉害！你每天练习吗？
bot_pinyin: yī nián le! hěn lì hài! nǐ měi tiān liàn xí ma?
bot_eng: One year! That's impressive! Do you practice every day?
expected_pinyin: duì wǒ měi tiān liàn xí

bot_pinyin: nǐ zuì xǐ huān shén me zhōng guó cài?

bot_zh: 饺子很好吃！你会做饺子吗？
bot_pinyin: jiǎo zi hěn hǎo chī! nǐ huì zuò jiǎo zi ma?
bot_eng: Dumplings are delicious! Can you make dumplings?
expected_pinyin: bú huì wǒ bú huì zuò

bot_zh: 没关系！学做饭也很有趣。你有空的时候喜欢做什么？
bot_pinyin: méi guān xi! xué zuò fàn yě hěn yǒu qù. nǐ yǒu kòng de shí hòu xǐ huān zuò shén me?
bot_eng: That's okay! Learning to cook is fun too. What do you like to do in your free time?
expected_pinyin: wǒ xǐ huān kàn diàn yǐng

bot_zh: 看电影很有意思！你看中文电影吗？
bot_pinyin: kàn diàn yǐng hěn yǒu yì si! nǐ kàn zhōng wén diàn yǐng ma?
bot_eng: Watching movies is interesting! Do you watch Chinese movies?

bot_zh: 非常好！继续加油！你还有什么问题要问我吗？
bot_pinyin: fēi cháng hǎo! jì xù jiā yóu! nǐ hái yǒu shén me wèn tí yào wèn wǒ ma?
bot_eng: Very good! Keep it up! Do you have any questions for me?

bot_zh: 不客气！我们下次再聊吧。再见！
bot_pinyin: bú kè qi! wǒ men xià cì zài liáo ba. zài jiàn!
bot_eng: You're welcome! Let's chat again next time. Goodbye!
